text:
I helped my 84yo abuelita sign up for a #COVID19 #vaccine yesterday.

The system requires:
1⃣Knowledge of eligibility
2⃣Internet
3⃣Email
4⃣Printing docs to review/sign

And NONE of this is in Spanish!

Just a few of the many structural barriers leading to #vaccination #inequity https://t.co/t8r5aAMvrY
